name: Virtual Bubble Wrap
description:
Love the sensory feeling of popping bubble wrap, but hate wasting plastic? Look no further! With this mini-window-game you can have endless supplies of virtual bubble wrap, with exciting standard colors too! Reminiscent of old Windows XP games, I hope will bring nostalgia to those who play! I'm also really proud of how the audio for the game came out, as I did all the sounds myself. 

**(Please not this is just a fun project, and dose NOT reflect the type of game I want to pursue in the future!) First game I actually release, not my first game I've worked on though.
